metadata.name: We Check Cast
metadata.description:
This artwork may or may not be a community.

An experimental celebration of the farcaster community and checks; and an exploration of the farcaster api.

Your identity becomes a permanent part of the art when you mint, by recasting you are part temporarily.

The first in the We Are The Art series.

How it works:

Holders show first in the art,  
Recasters show after holders in any available spaces.

The art shows the farcaster pfp of the wallet that holds the art or recasts this cast.

80 token limit ERC1155, once the piece has minted out it will only show holders.
